## Bio

Katlyn Schmeltzer is an MCEE student in the Civil and Environmental Engineering department at Rice University focusing on environmental engineering.
Katlyn completed her BS in Chemistry at Rice University.
She is interested in emerging contaminants and hydrologic modeling to inform remediation efforts amid climate change.
